messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Gargoyles
messages.msgSnippet: ... The Gargoyles are transported to Manhattan by the evil Xanatos. They escape his manipulation and befriend a female police officer. There s magic, good vs.
messages.messageBody:
>So now that I finally broke down and got a TV and cable, what the heck is
>Gargoyles? Why might I want to watch it? (I don't think my guys have
>watched it, at least so far.)
>Tia


The Gargoyles are transported to Manhattan by the evil Xanatos. They
escape his manipulation and befriend a female police officer. There's
magic, good vs. bad, time travel, intrigue.

Best of all, I personally have fun guessing who'd doing the voices.. as
they have had many famouse and familiar actors/actresses on the show.
Including Sean Connery, Ed Asner et al.

http://www.bcdb.com/pages/Disney/Television/Gargoyles/

kolleen
